alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 12:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jackson, northeastern Bay, central Holmes and Washington Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1136 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms near Bonifay, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Bradford, Cottondale, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Esto, Westville, Campbellton, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Holmes Valley, Porter Lake, Izagora, New Hope and Bahoma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
